wikipedia_page.main: Ronald James Phoenix (30 June 1929 – March 2021) was an English footballer who played as a wing half in the Football League for Manchester City and Rochdale.In May 2019, Phoenix resided in a care home in Trafford, Greater Manchester.His death was announced on 10 March 2021. He was 91.
